product_name: Gerber GDC Tech Skin Pocket Knife
long_description: A member of the Daily Carry line, the Gerber GDC Tech Skin pocket knife folds down small to fit easily in your pocket and folds out to reveal a reliable and durable cutting tool. When folded, this knife has no exposed metal, making ideal for carrying in your pocket along with other items. 7Cr17 stainless-steel blade features a fine edge and dual thumb studs. Polyurethane handle is contoured for comfort and enhanced grip.
short_description: A member of the Daily Carry line, the Gerber GDC Tech Skin pocket knife folds down small to fit easily in your pocket and folds out to reveal a reliable and durable cutting tool.
